import Header from "./components/Header"; import Events from "./components/Events"; import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const [events, setEvents] = useState([ { id: 1, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, { id: 2, text: "Anniversary event", time: "abcd", registered: true, }, { id: 3, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, { id: 4, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, { id: 5, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, { id: 6, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, { id: 7, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, { id: 8, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, { id: 9, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, { id: 10, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, { id: 11, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, { id: 12, text: "Birthday event", time: "abcd", registered: false, }, ]); const deleteEvent = (id) => { setEvents(events.filter((eve) => eve.id !== id)); }; const toggleRegistered = (id) => { setEvents( events.map((eve) => eve.id === id ? { ...eve, registered: !eve.registered } : eve ) ); }; return (

{events.length > 0 ? ( ) : ( "No Events to show. Create an event using the CREATE EVENT BUTTON" )}
); } export default App;
